name: ragstack-lambda
description: Serverless OCR-to-Knowledge Base pipeline on AWS

scripts.lint: uv run ruff check . && uv run ruff format . --check
scripts.lint:fix: uv run ruff check . --fix && uv run ruff format .
scripts.lint:frontend: cd src/ui && npm run lint && npx tsc --noEmit && cd ../ragstack-chat && npm run lint && npx tsc --noEmit
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:backend: uv run pytest tests/unit/python/ -m 'not integration' -v --tb=short -n auto
scripts.test:frontend: cd src/ui && npm test && cd ../ragstack-chat && npm test
scripts.check: npm run lint:all && npm run test
